title: Encouragement Echo
shortDescription: Choose life-giving words to grow a community garden and help neighbors heal relationships.
learningGoal: identify how words build or break community; memorize a short verse
childCopy: Pick friendly words — watch your garden and neighbors bloom.
matureNote: Explains Biblical anthropology of speech: the tongue shows heart-transformation in Christ and must be used to build up, not tear down.
acceptanceCriteria: 80% of playtesters can state one way words help others; memorization quiz >=75%

title: Joyful Noise
shortDescription: Rhythm/worship mini-game that unlocks a kingdom worship track and raises communal morale.
learningGoal: connect music to worship and community encouragement; learn a short chorus
childCopy: Make a joyful noise — unlock a new worship track for your kingdom.
matureNote: Theology of song as redemptive praise; notes on cultural/liturgical differences and worship as response to Christ.
acceptanceCriteria: 85% identify worship as response to God, not magical cause

title: Prayer Path
shortDescription: Guided daily prayer challenges and a streak habit that earns spiritual nourishment.
learningGoal: form basic prayer rhythms; learn Lord's Prayer synopsis and application
childCopy: Build a Prayer Path — small steps every day.
matureNote: Disciplines are means of grace; pastoral cautions on motive and avoiding ritualism.

title: Quiet Lamp
shortDescription: Short guided Scripture meditation that improves focus and unlocks memory verse bonuses.
learningGoal: practice Scripture meditation and recall; internalize one verse
childCopy: Be still and listen — find the verse hidden in the quiet.
matureNote: Explains Christian meditation (treasuring God's word) and distinguishes it from mystical/occult practices.

title: Neighborly Hands
shortDescription: Asynchronous help-quests where players aid NPCs and send revive tokens to friends.
learningGoal: practice hospitality, reconciliation, and mutual service
childCopy: Help your neighbor — send a revive of Living Water.
matureNote: Theology of church as body; guidance for pastoral care and healthy boundaries.
acceptanceCriteria: increase in cooperative play metrics; 90% identify service as expression of faith

title: Garden of Remembrance
shortDescription: Plant, nurture, and restore a kingdom garden while learning how stewardship reflects worship.
learningGoal: connect care for creation to worship and gratitude
childCopy: Tend the Garden — care for creation as an act of thanks.
matureNote: Theology of stewardship versus dominion; creation’s redemption in Christ.
acceptanceCriteria: players can match stewardship action to scripture explanation >=80%

title: Lady Wisdom's Call
shortDescription: Find Lady Wisdom in the market and answer three true‑to‑life questions wisely.
learningGoal: recognize wise choices and seek counsel
childCopy: Lady Wisdom is calling — choose the wise answer and earn a Wisdom token.
matureNote: Explains Proverbs' personification of Wisdom and how Christian wisdom seeks God; links to James 1:5 for prayerful seeking.
acceptanceCriteria: Player correctly chooses wise answers in 3/3 scenarios; theological note attached.

title: Prudent Path
shortDescription: Choose the safe, wise path at the crossroads and explain why.
childCopy: Which road will you take? Think ahead and pick the safe route.
matureNote: Prudence is practical wisdom that helps protect the community; connected to biblical prudence in Proverbs.
acceptanceCriteria: Player explains the wise choice in a short summary; community test passes.

title: House of Understanding
shortDescription: Solve the Riddle of Meaning in the House of Scrolls to gain Understanding.
learningGoal: interpret Scripture and parables with care
childCopy: Help the librarian find the true meaning — win the Understanding token.
matureNote: Understanding helps apply Scripture faithfully and is related to discernment; exegesis notes in Mature Mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Player explains riddle meaning clearly in a short checkpoint.

title: Discernment Trial
shortDescription: Test teachings at the council and decide which are true and which are false.
learningGoal: learn to test teachings and recognize truth
childCopy: Can you tell which claims are true? Use discernment and win the Discernment token.
matureNote: Discernment is a spiritual skill developed by Scripture knowledge and prayer; Mature Mode includes historical background on false teaching.
acceptanceCriteria: Player correctly identifies truth/false in at least 4 of 5 items.

title: Steward's Oath
shortDescription: Tend the community garden and decide fair ways to share the harvest.
learningGoal: practice stewardship of gifts and resources
childCopy: Care for the garden and share with your neighbors — earn the Stewardship token.
matureNote: Stewardship is faithful care of God's gifts and resources; theology of stewardship in Mature Mode.
acceptanceCriteria: Player demonstrates fair sharing decisions in the garden simulation.

title: Voices of Prophecy
shortDescription: Study biblical prophecy and practice discerning messages with prayerful reflection.
learningGoal: understand the role of prophecy in Scripture and practice discernment and pastoral humility
childCopy: This topic is for older learners — it explores prophecy, its purpose, and how to read it carefully.
matureNote: A deeper study on prophecy: biblical backgrounds, how Christians discern prophetic words, pastoral safeguards, and reflection questions for mature learners and church leaders.
acceptanceCriteria: Players can describe the purpose of prophecy in Scripture and explain healthy discernment practices.
